description:
Life is stressful for just one reason: your mind is getting in the way. Lost in thoughts, our lives are inevitably difficult, anxious and stressful, but not lost in thought? That's another story, and all it takes is 4 steps.

Learn how to hone your awareness down to this instant, how to accept whatever happens, how to find peace amidst chaos and you will be more peaceful than you could have imagined. But add to this the final step, knowing who you really are, and you won't believe what happens. In these four steps, the keys to a life of fun, enthusiasm and joy are contained, a life you will love.

Send me a message after signup and I will also send you free bonus material to enhance your course experience.
title: Happiness Unmystified - Your Guide to Nowfulness
